body.p: After considering respondents’ views, the FASB included in SFAS 141 the pro forma disclosure requirements from APB Opinion 16. However, the FASB also continued the exemption of non‑public entities from the pro forma disclosure requirements. Preparers and auditors of financial statements of non‑public entities urged the FASB to continue that exemption, which was initially provided by FASB Statement No. 79 Elimination of Certain Disclosures for Business Combinations by Nonpublic Enterprises.
